identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Academic' interface that feels like a futuristic control room, not a spreadsheet.
core_principles: Fusion: Mix 'University Library' warmth with 'Hacker Terminal' precision.
Emotion: The user is 'hunting' for a space. Make it feel like a discovery.
Negative Space: Use 3x more padding than standard Shadcn defaults.
No Boring Grids: Use the 'Tetris' grid layout for results.

heading.usage: All headers (h1-h6), data values, room numbers

rules: Overlines (small labels) must be UPPERCASE, text-xs, and tracking-widest.

usage_rules: Status indicators (Available/Occupied) must have a 'glow' effect (box-shadow).
Gradients are FORBIDDEN except for the 'Search Beam' effect.

rules: Cards must have 'h-full' to stretch evenly.
Use 'masonry' style for the room result list if possible, or strict grid with varied spans.

search_bar.classes: h-14 rounded-full bg-slate-900/50 border-slate-700 backdrop-blur-xl text-lg px-6 shadow-2xl focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-300
search_bar.icon: Search icon must be absolute right-4 text-slate-400

room_card.classes: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-800 bg-slate-900/50 p-6 hover:border-indigo-500/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_-10px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)]

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-500 text-white rounded-lg font-medium px-6 py-3 shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/20 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 rounded-lg px-6 py-3 border border-slate-700

badges.style: rounded-md px-2 py-1 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider border

hero_background.usage: Main dashboard background with heavy overlay (bg-slate-950/90)

auth_background.usage: Split screen layout for Login/Register pages

interactions: Page Load: Staggered fade-in for grid items

rules: All interactive elements must have aria-label if no text is present.
Focus rings must be visible (ring-2 ring-indigo-500).
Contrast ratio for text must be > 4.5:1 (Use Slate-200 or lighter on Slate-900).

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center text in cards (Left align for readability).
Do not use default scrollbars (Hide them or style them thin).

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend. Use the provided JSON to guide every styling decision. When creating the 'Room Card', refer to the 'components.room_card' section. When setting up the layout, refer to 'layout.grid_strategy'. Do not deviate from the 'Cyber-Academic' theme. Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and placeholders.
